Our team handles the details. catering Specials ALL SPECIALS slideshow start stop playing Slide 1 content Slide 2 content previous slide next slide Celebrate together with great food! parties Fresh flavors for every occasion! catering Skip Photo Gallery Reviews Start stop reviews carousel Review by - Google james: five star review by This food right here is top tier! I've never had ox tails until tonight and I wasn't sure what to expect but trust me they didn't disappoint. I even danced while I ate! Review by - Google Marica -: five star review by In the Charleston area, and looking for authentic Caribbean food comes to Caribbean Delight. Some of the best oxtail I have tasted in a long time, the rice and peas cooked to perfection. The curry goat was tender, and plantains were delicious. The staff was friendly and the food was ready quickly. Review by - Google jason: five star review by Had a taste for oxtails for so long I had to make the 1.5 hour drive. I ordered the large oxtail plate with cabbage, rice and peas. All of it was so delicious. I was full as a tick when I was done. I 100% recommend and will be back soon. Review by - Google That W: five star review by Stopped by here about a month ago with a friend and at first I was skeptical but let me tell you the food was delicious. Customer service was good as well. I've been back twice since then....try the jerk chicken. Review by - Google Edward S: five star review by Small place but big food favors and excellent service and everything was great enjoyed my food only regret that I didn't get a extra to go.
